LanguageData.DBHSwimmingPool.label: piscina
LanguageData.DBHSwimmingPool.description: Piscina usada para hidroterapia, relaxamento ou lazer. Deve ser enchido com torre de água primeiro.
LanguageData.DBHSwimmingPool_Blueprint.label: swimming pool (blueprint)
LanguageData.DBHSwimmingPool_Frame.label: swimming pool (building)
LanguageData.DBHSwimmingPool_Frame.description: Swimming pool used for hydrotherapy, relaxation, or pleasure. Must be filled with water from water towers first.
LanguageData.HotTub.label: hidromassagem
LanguageData.HotTub.description: Banheira de hidromassagem usada para hidroterapia, relaxamento ou prazer. Deve ser enchido com torre de água no primeiro uso. Autoaquecida e não necessita de saida de esgoto.
LanguageData.HotTub_Blueprint.label: hot tub (blueprint)
LanguageData.HotTub_Blueprint_Install.label: hot tub (blueprint)
LanguageData.HotTub_Frame.label: hot tub (building)
LanguageData.HotTub_Frame.description: Hot tub used for hydrotherapy, relaxation, or pleasure. Filled with water from water towers on first use. Self-heated and does not require a sewage outlet.
LanguageData.WashingMachine.label: máquina de lavar
LanguageData.WashingMachine.description: Lava roupas tão bem que nem dá para perceber que alguém morreu usando isso!
LanguageData.WashingMachine_Blueprint.label: washing machine (blueprint)
LanguageData.WashingMachine_Blueprint_Install.label: washing machine (blueprint)
LanguageData.WashingMachine_Frame.label: washing machine (building)
LanguageData.WashingMachine_Frame.description: Washes clothes so well that you can't even tell someone died wearing it!
